name: Phantasm Spiral Assault
text: Target 1 "Phantasm Spiral Dragon" you control; if it destroys 3 of your opponent's Effect Monsters by battle while it is equipped with 3 or more "Phantasm Spiral" Equip Spell Cards with different names, you win the Duel. If "Umi" is on the field, you can activate this card from your hand. If a Normal Monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your Graveyard instead.
